sentences.sContent: But he cleared from any liability his close friend, interior deputy minister Rico Puno, saying he did not violate any law or rule.
sentences.sCn: 但阿基诺三世免除了其密友、内政部副部长普诺(Rico Puno)的所有责任，称他没有违反任何法律法规。

sentences.sContent: Officials were still trying to determine the exact number of people intercepted by about 100 gunmen and taken to a remote mountainous area, said the interior secretary, Ronaldo Puno.
sentences.sCn: 内政部长罗纳尔多·普诺（Ronaldo Puno）说，官员们仍在试图确定约100名持枪歹徒劫持并带到偏远山区的人质的确切数字。
